string.name: photopicker_privacy_explainer
string.translation_description: A privacy banner message that is shown to the user when photopicker is opened by the application

resources.string: %1$s will only have access to the photos you select

string.name: photopicker_privacy_explainer_permission_mode
string.translation_description: A privacy banner message that is shown to the user when photopicker is used in permission mode.

resources.string: Select photos and videos that you allow %1$s to access

string.name: photopicker_privacy_explainer_generic_app_name
string.translation_description: A generic identifier of an application that is used in place of the Apps name if one is not defined or can not be fetched.
